content: The second question is really a broader question on the risk to this fabulous dynamic you're experiencing at the moment where you can pay deposit customers, even in interest-bearing accounts of 20, 25 basis points, but then put that overnight with the Bank of England at 125 basis points, either the risk of some form of political pressure to increase savings rates, or maybe more likely the Bank of England deciding at some point not to pay base rate in its entirety on the overnight reserve balances.
